title: Cold storage and temperature-controlled shipping records
dataVerified: Shipper, carrier, consignee, temperature range, monitoring records
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Temperature status (compliant/excursion). Link to cold chain operator system (parties and regulators, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents temperature excursion fraud (spoiled goods). Domain binding verifies cold chain operator. Food safety compliance (FDA, FSMA). Pharmaceutical GDP compliance. Liability documentation.
